answerText: Darwin term[10] The hydrogen atom obeys a potential based on this law, which states that the force between a pair of charges is proportional to the product of the charges over the square of the distance between them.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 8 | 11 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: It is equal to two times the principal quantum number times energy squared all over m c squared. For 10 points each: [10] Name this term found in the Hamiltonian of the hydrogen atom, which raises the energy of the 2s orbital to be equal to the 2p orbital.
